NominalTimeRunFacet.description: The period of time of which an event is expected or known to happen. Example can be something that is scheduled to happen on a given time.

nominalStartTime.description: An [ISO-8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) timestamp representing the nominal start time (included) of the run. AKA the schedule time

nominalEndTime.description: An [ISO-8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) timestamp representing the nominal end time (excluded) of the run. (Should be the nominal start time of the next run)
